      • BusinessPartnerExists

        public static boolean BusinessPartnerExists(java.lang.String id)
        Method to check if a Business Partner exists.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the Business Partner. Required to check if a Business Partner with given ID exists.
        Returns:
        true if Businesspartner with given id exists once, else false.
